snippet.title: Quadline - Trailer
snippet.description:
Quadline is an abstract puzzle game with minimalistic and clear design but with deep and variative mechanics.
Move lines through the cells to put them in specific slots. Rotate, move, push, morph or teleport them and use other game tools to solve fun puzzles.
The game is fully symmetrical and doesn't have any text or numbers.

Features:
 • New unique puzzle mechanics with high variety and complexity.
 • 120+ individually designed levels based on 8 core mechanics and their combinations.
 • No timers or pressure: just you and puzzles.
 • Self-explanatory flow that doesn’t need any interruptive tutorials.
 • Minimalistic, clean and simple design.
 • Symmetrical gameplay experience.
 • Light and Dark mode.
 • Colorblind-friendly.
 • One-tap controls.
 • Built-in solutions.
 • Not a single text line.

Apple App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/tt/app/quadline/id1575569233

Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.IvanKovalov.quadline.android
